summary:
Dragonbone armor retexture with more color details. 
Now new with HD version!
descriptionHtml:
NEW VERSION:
Dragonbone retexture: Crimson Armor HD 

[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/3557-1-1327061988.jpg[/img]

Version 2.0
All textures in 2048x2048 pixel

[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/3557-3-1327061990.jpg[/img]

+ New High res pattern used for all parts 
+ Matching FX textures added
+ male and female version
+ partially handpainted details

[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/3557-2-1327061990.jpg[/img]

Includes: 
Dragonbone helmet 
Dragonbone boots
Dragonbone gauntlets
Dragonbone armor
Dragonbone shield


Dragonbones cleaned up and strengthend with ebony resin. Leather parts coloured with a dragonblood dyre. Gold was used to higlight the details. ;)


Note:
Gold-and Darksilver version still there just as optional downloads. 

===INSTALLATION===
Extract the folder into your Skyrim directory. (C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)


===UNINSTALL===
To uninstall, Go to C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\dragonbone and delete the dragonbone folder. 
(if you installed more textures for other weapons be sure to delete only the dragonbone \".dds\" files in the folder)

Have fun

Edit:
Version 1.1
- Color correction on helmet
- optional additional set of Darksilver armor variant
- added female dragonbone armor for gold and darksilver version

Edit:
version 1.11 Optional file added only
Optional file added  to color sync the dragonhood and the dragonpriest helmet \'Otar\'. I use that and if anyone out there preferes the resitance buffs of Otar over the dragonbonehelmet aswell, then this ist the file for you. (screenshots updated)
(how to instal readme located in the ZIP file of the optional download)

Edit:
Version 2.0 
Crimson Armor HD (new screenshots added)
author: feuerkorn
